price: Rather, Allah raised him up to Himself[106], and Allah is All-Mighty, All-Wise.
arabic: بَل رَّفَعَهُ ٱللَّهُ إِلَيۡهِۚ وَكَانَ ٱللَّهُ عَزِيزًا حَكِيمٗا

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Englsih by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: bal rafaʿahu al-lahu ilayhi wakāna al-lahu ʿazīzan ḥakīman
